newsitem.title: USA: Access Health names Tallman president.
newsitem.headline: Access Health names Tallman president.

text.p: Access Health Inc said it has named Joseph Tallman as president and chief operating officer, effective immediately. Tallman's promotion follows the resignation of previous preesident Thomas Gardner.

Tallman served as executive vice president and director of Access Health since its merger with Informed Access Systems in November. Tallman founded Informed Access and served as its president and chief executive until the merger.

Access Health said it has also named Frank Washington to succeed Kenneth Plumlee as chairman of the board. Plumlee, the founder of Access Health, has agreed to continue as a director and to provide consulting services to the board.
Washington is the president and CEO of System Integrators Inc, a provider of publishing solutions and is also president of World Television LLC, a television broadcasting concern.
